What to Know About Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal

Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal

Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal | Check Now

What to Know About Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal

Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal allows formal and prospective students in the College to create an account or log in to perform certain academic actions at ease, including Course Registration, Fees Payment, Exam Results, Admission Online Application, Application Status, Acceptance Fees Payment, Transcript, Timetable, Academic Calander, Extra Credit Hours, Deferment of Admission and so much more.

Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal

Student Login portal of the Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College is accessible as follows;

Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Portal | Check Now

You will need your Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Student Login ID and Password respective to view the portal.

  • Go to the Ga-Rankuwa Nursing College Login Page at
  • Log in with your Login ID and Password,
  • Click on the Submit or Login button.

You should be redirected to your official portal to access all the necessary information.
